channel.title: CVE Feed for Zyxel -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zyxel -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5372|2024-08-23T18:58:04.490Z -- zyxel -- nas326%20firmware
item.description: The post-authentication command injection vulnerability in Zyxel NAS326 firmware versions through V5.21(AAZF.15)C0 and NAS542 firmware versions through V5.21(ABAG.12)C0 could allow an authenticated attacker with administrator privileges to execute some operating system (OS) commands by sending a crafted query parameter attached to the URL of an affected device’s web management interface.

item.title: CVE-2023-37929|2024-08-02T17:23:27.734Z -- zyxel -- v5.50%28abpm.8%29c0%20firmware
item.description: The buffer overflow vulnerability in the CGI program of the VMG3625-T50B firmware version V5.50(ABPM.8)C0 could allow an authenticated remote attacker to cause denial of service (DoS) conditions by sending a crafted HTTP request to a vulnerable device.

item.title: CVE-2024-0816|2024-08-01T18:18:18.882Z -- zyxel -- dx3300-t1%20firmware
item.description: The buffer overflow vulnerability in the DX3300-T1 firmware version V5.50(ABVY.4)C0 could allow an authenticated local attacker to cause denial of service (DoS) conditions by executing the CLI command with crafted strings on an affected device.

item.title: CVE-2024-1575|2024-08-01T18:40:21.490Z -- zyxel -- wbe660s%20firmware
item.description: The improper privilege management vulnerability in the Zyxel WBE660S firmware version 6.70(ACGG.3) and earlier versions could allow an authenticated user to escalate privileges and download the configuration files on a vulnerable device.

item.title: CVE-2024-1575|2024-07-23T13:18:27.277Z -- zyxel -- wbe660s%20firmware
item.description: The improper privilege management vulnerability in the Zyxel WBE660S firmware version 6.70(ACGG.3) and earlier versions could allow an authenticated user to escalate privileges and download the configuration files on a vulnerable device.

item.title: CVE-2024-29972|2024-06-26T03:55:24.711Z -- zyxel -- nas326%20firmware
item.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** The command injection vulnerability in the CGI program "remote_help-cgi" in Zyxel NAS326 firmware versions before V5.21(AAZF.17)C0 and NAS542 firmware versions before V5.21(ABAG.14)C0 could allow an unauthenticated attacker to execute some operating system (OS) commands by sending a crafted HTTP POST request.

item.title: CVE-2024-29973|2024-06-26T03:55:25.902Z -- zyxel -- nas326%20firmware
item.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** The command injection vulnerability in the “setCookie” parameter in Zyxel NAS326 firmware versions before V5.21(AAZF.17)C0 and NAS542 firmware versions before V5.21(ABAG.14)C0 could allow an unauthenticated attacker to execute some operating system (OS) commands by sending a crafted HTTP POST request.

item.title: CVE-2024-29973|2024-06-22T03:55:26.681Z -- zyxel -- nas326%20firmware
item.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** The command injection vulnerability in the “setCookie” parameter in Zyxel NAS326 firmware versions before V5.21(AAZF.17)C0 and NAS542 firmware versions before V5.21(ABAG.14)C0 could allow an unauthenticated attacker to execute some operating system (OS) commands by sending a crafted HTTP POST request.

item.title: CVE-2023-37929|2024-05-21T01:23:53.073Z -- zyxel -- v5.50%28abpm.8%29c0%20firmware
item.description: The buffer overflow vulnerability in the CGI program of the VMG3625-T50B firmware version V5.50(ABPM.8)C0 could allow an authenticated remote attacker to cause denial of service (DoS) conditions by sending a crafted HTTP request to a vulnerable device.

item.title: CVE-2024-0816|2024-06-04T17:58:43.786Z -- zyxel -- dx3300-t1%20firmware
item.description: The buffer overflow vulnerability in the DX3300-T1 firmware version V5.50(ABVY.4)C0 could allow an authenticated local attacker to cause denial of service (DoS) conditions by executing the CLI command with crafted strings on an affected device.

item.title: CVE-2024-29976|2024-06-06T15:45:01.336Z -- zyxel -- nas326%20firmware
item.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** The improper privilege management vulnerability in the command “show_allsessions” in Zyxel NAS326 firmware versions before V5.21(AAZF.17)C0 and NAS542 firmware versions before V5.21(ABAG.14)C0 could allow an authenticated attacker to obtain a logged-in administrator’s session information containing cookies on an affected device.

item.title: CVE-2024-29975|2024-06-05T13:00:30.502Z -- zyxel -- nas326%20firmware
item.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** The improper privilege management vulnerability in the SUID executable binary in Zyxel NAS326 firmware versions before V5.21(AAZF.17)C0 and NAS542 firmware versions before V5.21(ABAG.14)C0 could allow an authenticated local attacker with administrator privileges to execute some system commands as the “root” user on a vulnerable device.

item.title: CVE-2024-29974|2024-06-05T05:15:39.188Z -- zyxel -- nas326%20firmware
item.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** The remote code execution vulnerability in the CGI program “file_upload-cgi” in Zyxel NAS326 firmware versions before V5.21(AAZF.17)C0 and NAS542 firmware versions before V5.21(ABAG.14)C0 could allow an unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code by uploading a crafted configuration file to a vulnerable device.

item.title: CVE-2024-29973|2024-06-05T04:01:28.607Z -- zyxel -- nas326%20firmware
item.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** The command injection vulnerability in the “setCookie” parameter in Zyxel NAS326 firmware versions before V5.21(AAZF.17)C0 and NAS542 firmware versions before V5.21(ABAG.14)C0 could allow an unauthenticated attacker to execute some operating system (OS) commands by sending a crafted HTTP POST request.

item.title: CVE-2024-29972|2024-06-05T05:15:38.583Z -- zyxel -- nas326%20firmware
item.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** The command injection vulnerability in the CGI program "remote_help-cgi" in Zyxel NAS326 firmware versions before V5.21(AAZF.17)C0 and NAS542 firmware versions before V5.21(ABAG.14)C0 could allow an unauthenticated attacker to execute some operating system (OS) commands by sending a crafted HTTP POST request.

item.description: The buffer overflow vulnerability in the CGI program of the VMG3625-T50B firmware version V5.50(ABPM.8)C0 could allow an authenticated remote attacker to cause denial of service (DoS) conditions by sending a crafted HTTP request to a vulnerable device.
